verbs.description: [ARG0: Nike] [V: said] [ARG1: its decision follows the Trump administration 's plan to reimpose sanctions on the Middle Eastern nation] .
Nike said [ARG1: its decision] [V: follows] [ARG2: the Trump administration 's plan to reimpose sanctions on the Middle Eastern nation] .
Nike said its decision follows the Trump administration 's plan to [V: reimpose] [ARG1: sanctions on the Middle Eastern nation] .
